constructor-arg.value: select m.id, m.name_russian, m.name_native, m.released_date, m.rating, m.price, m.picture_path from movieland.movie m;
select m.id, m.name_russian, m.name_native, m.released_date, m.rating, m.price, m.picture_path from movieland.movie m order by rand() limit 3;
select mc.country_id, c.name country_name, mc.movie_id from movieland.movie_country mc join movieland.country c on c.id = mc.country_id;
select mg.movie_id, g.name genre_name, mg.genre_id from movieland.genre g join movieland.movie_genre mg on mg.genre_id = g.id;
